Mr. James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
National Assoc, of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D.C.
Dear Mr. Fellows:
As we discussed on the telephone last week, you may
have permission to use H.Dâ€™s "Oread" on a Voice of America
program, and to publish the poem in booklets, as per your letter
of March 12th to Professor Pearson. There will be no fee.
The credit line should give the followine_information:
H.D. SELECTED POEMS, Grove Press, Inc., Copyright/cl957 by
Norman Holmes Pearson. Please send us two copies o'f any booklet
in which you include the poem.
Sincerely yours,
Judith^ Schmidt
